title: Walter The Einstein Frog
description: Imagine what a frog can do when he is endowed with Einstein’s brain.
quote: Walter, you’ve just saved the life of the President’s son.
altHero: a giant frog with a clear dome on its head housing a human brain
alt1: a doctor points at some x-rays of a brain
alt2: a doctor kneels in front of Walter the Frog whose brain is glowing red
alt3: two brains on a surgical tray
alt4: a man and Walter in a spaceship cockpit
